meanings.definition: The act of gathering or collecting things together.
meanings.sent1: During the ingatherings, everyone helped bring in the crops.
meanings.sent2: The community's ingatherings for the food drive were successful.
meanings.sent3: At the ingatherings, the squirrels decided to gather acorns for a feast.
meanings.sent4: Her ingatherings of memories filled her heart with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The ingatherings of seashells on the shore sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A gathering or assembly of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The ingatherings of friends at the park were always joyful.
meanings.sent2: The ingatherings of books in the library made it cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The ingatherings of toys in the playroom seemed to have a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The ingatherings of stars in the night sky created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The ingatherings of clouds before a storm were ominous yet beautiful.

meanings.definition: The harvest or yield of a crop.
meanings.sent1: The ingatherings of apples in the orchard were plentiful this year.
meanings.sent2: Farmers eagerly awaited the ingatherings of wheat after a season of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The ingatherings of pumpkins in the field made for a festive autumn display.
meanings.sent4: The ingatherings of grapes in the vineyard signaled the start of winemaking.
meanings.sent5: The ingatherings of vegetables from the garden were fresh and delicious.
